page.title: 07Shouldham-Village activities
page.content:
{Good Companions:} They meet each fortnight (Thursday afernoons) in the Village Hall. This is for retired people and they are joined by people outside the block. The main purpose is of a social nature and visits are arranged during the year. Each meeting concludes with some form of game-quite frequently bingo is played.
{Youth Club:}This meets weekly in the Village Hall and was inaugurated a year ago. The youngsters-up to 11-meet from 7 to 8.30 and the Seniors follow. Much of the activity is based on games and sport, but it seems the older youths are not prepared to do much, most of their needs have to be provided and it would seem this will not last very long.
